Each gene represents a city index.

member.name: T:GeneticSharp.Extensions.Tsp.TspFitness
member.summary:
Travelling Salesman Problem fitness function.
The travelling salesman problem (TSP) or travelling salesperson problem asks the following question: Given a list of cities and the distances between each pair of cities, what is the shortest possible route that visits each city exactly once and returns to the origin city? Wikipedia
